events.description: The RBI decided to keep its policy rate unchanged.
A surprise trade agreement between the US and India.

facts.fact_text: BSE Sensex closed about 0.3% up at 83,580 on Friday.

evidences.evidence_text: India's BSE Sensex reversed early losses to close about 0.3% up at 83,580 on Friday

facts.fact_text: ITC led the way with a 5.2% increase following reports of fresh price hikes and strong Q3 earnings.

evidences.evidence_text: Among individual stocks, ITC (+5.2%) led the way, tracking other cigarette stocks, following reports of fresh price hikes and strong Q3 earnings

facts.fact_text: TCS (-1.8%), Tech Mahindra (-1.7%) and Adani Ports (-1.3%) posted the biggest losses.

evidences.evidence_text: Conversely, TCS (-1.8%), Tech Mahindra (-1.7%) and Adani Ports (-1.3%) posted the biggest losses.

facts.fact_text: For the week, the index rose 1.6%.

evidences.evidence_text: For the week, the index rose 1.6%.

claims.claim_text: Sentiment steadied following a volatile week, buoyed by a surprise US-India trade agreement and the RBI’s decision to keep its policy rate unchanged.

evidences.evidence_text: Sentiment steadied following a volatile week, buoyed by a surprise US-India trade agreement and the RBI’s decision to keep its policy rate unchanged.

claims.claim_text: The RBI’s policy announcement was broadly in line with expectations, maintaining a neutral stance while reiterating a constructive growth outlook.

evidences.evidence_text: The RBI’s policy announcement was broadly in line with expectations, maintaining a neutral stance while reiterating a constructive growth outlook.

links.source_ref: RBI’s decision to keep its policy rate unchanged

evidence.evidence_text: Sentiment steadied following a volatile week, buoyed by a surprise US-India trade agreement and the RBI’s decision to keep its policy rate unchanged.
The RBI’s policy announcement was broadly in line with expectations, maintaining a neutral stance while reiterating a constructive growth outlook.
Among individual stocks, ITC (+5.2%) led the way, tracking other cigarette stocks, following reports of fresh price hikes and strong Q3 earnings
